create.name: Create

message.name: Message

title.name: Title
title.description: Optional title for your notification. [Templates accepted]

notification_id.name: Notification ID

dismiss.name: Dismiss

save_persistent_states.name: Save Persistent States
save_persistent_states.description: Save the persistent states (for entities derived from RestoreEntity) immediately. Maintain the normal periodic saving interval.

turn_off.name: Generic turn off
turn_off.description: Generic service to turn devices off under any domain.

turn_on.name: Generic turn on
turn_on.description: Generic service to turn devices on under any domain.

toggle.name: Generic toggle
toggle.description: Generic service to toggle devices on/off under any domain

check_config.name: Check configuration

update_entity.name: Update entity

reload_config_entry.name: Reload config entry
reload_config_entry.description: Reload a config entry that matches a target.

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Start purge task - to clean up old data from your database.

keep_days.name: Days to keep
keep_days.description: Number of history days to keep in database after purge.

repack.name: Repack
repack.description: Attempt to save disk space by rewriting the entire database file.

apply_filter.name: Apply filter
apply_filter.description: Apply entity_id and event_type filter in addition to time based purge.

purge_entities.name: Purge Entities
purge_entities.description: Start purge task to remove specific entities from your database.

domains.name: Domains to remove

entity_globs.name: Entity Globs to remove
entity_globs.description: List the glob patterns to select entities for removal from the recorder database.

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Start the recording of events and state changes

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: Stop the recording of events and state changes

logger.name: Logger
logger.description: Logger name under which to log the message. Defaults to 'system_log.external'.

addon_update.name: Update add-on.
addon_update.description: Update add-on. This service should be used with caution since add-on updates can contain breaking changes. It is highly recommended that you review release notes/change logs before updating an add-on.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Slug of backup to restore from.

remote_connect.name: Remote connect
remote_connect.description: Make instance UI available outside over NabuCasa cloud

set_theme.name: Set theme
set_theme.description: Set a theme unless the client selected per-device theme.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The mode the theme is for.

install.name: Install update
install.description: Install an update for this device or service

version.name: Version
version.description: Version to install, if omitted, the latest version will be installed.

backup.name: Backup
backup.description: Backup before installing the update, if supported by the integration.

skip.name: Skip update
skip.description: Mark currently available update as skipped.

clear_skipped.name: Clear skipped update
clear_skipped.description: Removes the skipped version marker from an update.

reset.name: Reset

value.name: Value
value.description: Value to which set the meter

set_cover_position.name: Set position
set_cover_position.description: Move to specific position all or specified cover.

open_cover_tilt.name: Open tilt

close_cover_tilt.name: Close tilt

set_cover_tilt_position.name: Set tilt position
set_cover_tilt_position.description: Move to specific position all or specified cover tilt.

send_magic_packet.name: Send magic packet
send_magic_packet.description: Send a 'magic packet' to wake up a device with 'Wake-On-LAN' capabilities.

mac.name: MAC address
mac.description: MAC address of the device to wake up.

broadcast_address.name: Broadcast address
broadcast_address.description: Broadcast IP where to send the magic packet.

broadcast_port.name: Broadcast port
broadcast_port.description: Port where to send the magic packet.

select_option.name: Select
select_option.description: Select an option of an select entity.

command.description: Send a command to a browser.

debug.description: On all browsers, show a popup, and a javascript alert with the current device ID.

popup.description: Pop up a card on a browser.

title.description: Name to show in popup bar

card.description: YAML config for card to show

large.description: (optional) Set to true to make wider

hide_header.description: (optional) Hide header title and close button

auto_close.description: (optional) Close popup when mouse is moved or key is pressed. Also hides header

time.description: (optional) When mouse isn't moved or keys aren't pressed for this amount of seconds, reopen. Only usable with auto_close. See blackout

close_popup.description: Close all popups on all browsers.

navigate.description: Navigate to a path on a browser.

more_info.description: Open the more info dialog of an entity on a browser.

entity_id.description: Entity to show more info for

large.description: (optional) Set to true to make wider

set_theme.description: On all browsers, change the theme.

window_reload.description: Forces the browser to reload the page. Same as clicking your browser's refresh button. Note: This is not guaranteed to clear the frontend cache.

blackout.description: Cover screen in black until the mouse is moved or a key is pressed.

time.description: (optional) The blackout will turn on automatically after the specified number of seconds. It works kind of like a screensaver and will keep turning on until blackout is called again with time: -1.

no_blackout.description: Remove a blackout from a browser.

brightness.description: (optional) On a Fully Kiosk Browser Plus set the screen brightness from 0 - 255.

toast.description: Show a toast message in the bottom left on all browsers.

duration.description: (optional) Time in milliseconds to show message for. Set to 0 for persistent display.

commands.description: Send several commands to a browser

rgbw_color.description: A list containing four integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBW (red, green, blue, white) color for the light.

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW-color
rgbww_color.description: A list containing five integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBWW (red, green, blue, cold white, warm white) color for the light.

hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color
hs_color.description: Color for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.

xy_color.name: XY-color

color_temp.description: Color temperature for the light in mireds.

kelvin.name: Color temperature (Kelvin)
kelvin.description: Color temperature for the light in Kelvin.

brightness.name: Brightness value
brightness.description: Number indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number indicating percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

media_previous_track.description: Send the media player the command for previous track.

clear_playlist.name: Clear playlist
clear_playlist.description: Send the media player the command to clear players playlist.

volume_set.name: Set volume
volume_set.description: Set a media player's volume level.

volume_level.name: Level
volume_level.description: Volume level to set as float.

media_seek.name: Seek
media_seek.description: Send the media player the command to seek in current playing media.

seek_position.name: Position
seek_position.description: Position to seek to. The format is platform dependent.

join.name: Join
join.description: Group players together. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

group_members.name: Group members
group_members.description: The players which will be synced with the target player.

select_source.name: Select source
select_source.description: Send the media player the command to change input source.

source.name: Source
source.description: Name of the source to switch to. Platform dependent.

select_sound_mode.name: Select sound mode
select_sound_mode.description: Send the media player the command to change sound mode.

sound_mode.name: Sound mode
sound_mode.description: Name of the sound mode to switch to.

play_media.name: Play media
play_media.description: Send the media player the command for playing media.

media_content_id.name: Content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to play. Platform dependent.

media_content_type.name: Content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to play. Like image, music, tvshow, video, episode, channel or playlist.

enqueue.name: Enqueue
enqueue.description: If the content should be played now or be added to the queue.

announce.name: Announce
announce.description: If the media should be played as an announcement.

unjoin.name: Unjoin
unjoin.description: Unjoin the player from a group. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

enable_motion_detection.name: Enable motion detection
enable_motion_detection.description: Enable the motion detection in a camera.

disable_motion_detection.name: Disable motion detection
disable_motion_detection.description: Disable the motion detection in a camera.

snapshot.name: Take snapshot
snapshot.description: Take a snapshot from a camera.

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Template of a Filename. Variable is entity_id.

play_stream.name: Play stream
play_stream.description: Play camera stream on supported media player.

media_player.name: Media Player
media_player.description: Name(s) of media player to stream to.

format.name: Format
format.description: Stream format supported by media player.

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Template of a Filename. Variable is entity_id. Must be mp4.

lookback.name: Lookback
lookback.description: Target lookback period to include in addition to duration. Only available if there is currently an active HLS stream.

google_translate_say.name: Say an TTS message with google_translate
google_translate_say.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with google_translate.

cache.name: Cache
cache.description: Control file cache of this message.

language.name: Language
language.description: Language to use for speech generation.

options.name: Options
options.description: A dictionary containing platform-specific options. Optional depending on the platform.

edge_say.name: Say an TTS message with edge_tts
edge_say.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with edge_tts.

cache.name: Cache
cache.description: Control file cache of this message.

language.name: Language
language.description: Language to use for speech generation.

options.name: Options
options.description: A dictionary containing platform-specific options. Optional depending on the platform.

clear_cache.name: Clear TTS cache
clear_cache.description: Remove all text-to-speech cache files and RAM cache.

show_lovelace_view.name: Show lovelace view
show_lovelace_view.description: Show a Lovelace view on a Chromecast.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Media Player entity to show the Lovelace view on.

dashboard_path.name: Dashboard path
dashboard_path.description: The URL path of the Lovelace dashboard to show.

view_path.name: View Path
view_path.description: The path of the Lovelace view to show.

calendar_id.name: Calendar ID
calendar_id.description: The id of the calendar you want.

summary.name: Summary
summary.description: Acts as the title of the event.

description.name: Description
description.description: The description of the event. Optional.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.

start_date.name: Start date
start_date.description: The date the whole day event should start.

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: The date the whole day event should end.

in.name: In
in.description: Days or weeks that you want to create the event in.

summary.description: Acts as the title of the event.

description.name: Description
description.description: The description of the event. Optional.

start_date_time.name: Start time
start_date_time.description: The date and time the event should start.

end_date_time.name: End time
end_date_time.description: The date and time the event should end.

start_date.description: The date the whole day event should start.

end_date.name: End date
end_date.description: The date the whole day event should end.

in.name: In
in.description: Days or weeks that you want to create the event in.

set_fan_mode.name: Set fan mode
set_fan_mode.description: Set fan operation for dehumidifier device.

remote_start.name: Remote Start
remote_start.description: Send to ThinQ device the remote start command.

wake_up.name: WakeUp
wake_up.description: Send to ThinQ device the wakeup command.
